InstructionData.Title: Fuel management
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
### Fuel Management ### alias Self db alias FuelTank d0 alias OxygenInput d1 alias VolatileInput d2 alias FuelOutput d3
alias VolatileRatio r0 alias OxygenRatio r1 alias FuelAmount r2
define VolatileTarget 0.666 define OxygenTarget 0.333 define FuelExportQty 5000
Init: s VolatileInput On 0 s OxygenInput On 0 s FuelOutput On 0
Main: yield l VolatileRatio FuelTank RatioVolatiles l OxygenRatio FuelTank RatioOxygen blt VolatileRatio VolatileTarget AddVolatiles blt OxygenRatio OxygenTarget AddOxygen s VolatileInput On 0 s OxygenInput On 0 l FuelAmount FuelTank TotalMoles bgt FuelAmount FuelExportQty ExportFuel s FuelOutput On 0 j Main
AddVolatiles: s Self Setting VolatileRatio s VolatileInput On 1 s OxygenInput On 0 j Main
AddOxygen: s Self Setting OxygenRatio s VolatileInput On 0 s OxygenInput On 1 j Main
ExportFuel: s Self Setting FuelAmount s FuelOutput On 1 j Main
